p: In addition, we examined the protein expression of Nrf2 in the mouse hippocampus on day 4 post-TMT treatment. The level in TMT alone-treated group significantly increased compared to that in the saline-treated group (### p < 0.001), but the expression level was evidently reduced in the PBWE + TMT-treated groups ( n = 3 mice per group, * p < 0.05 and ** p < 0.01; Figure 5b) compared to that in the TMT alone-treated mice.
